Class connectionManager

java.lang.Object
connectionManager
public class connectionManager extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the connection to the database and executing queries.

  • Method Details

    • getPriceItem

      public double getPriceItem(String itemName)
      Retrieves the price of a menu item from the database based on its name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the menu item whose price is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The price of the item if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • getPriceToppings

      double getPriceToppings(String toppingName)
      Retrieves the price of a topping from the database based on its name.
      Parameters:
      toppingName - The name of the topping whose price is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The price of the topping if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • getOrderId

      int getOrderId()
      Retrieves the maximum order ID from the orders table in the database.
      Returns:
      The highest order ID found in the database. Returns 0 if no orders exist or an error occurs.

    • addOrder

      void addOrder(order currentOrder)
      Adds an order to the database.
      Parameters:
      currentOrder - The order to be added to the database.

    • getCustomerId

      int getCustomerId(String customerPhone)
      Retrieves the customer ID from the database based on the given phone number.
      Parameters:
      customerPhone - The phone number of the customer.
      Returns:
      The customer ID if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • getMenuID

      int getMenuID(String itemName)
      Retrieves the menu ID from the database based on the given item name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item.
      Returns:
      The menu ID if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • getDiscountPrice

      double getDiscountPrice(String discountName)
      Retrieves the discount value from the database based on the given discount name.
      Parameters:
      discountName - The name of the discount.
      Returns:
      The discount value if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • login

      public boolean login(String employeeName, String passwordEntered)
      Authenticates an employee by verifying their name and password against the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeName - The name of the employee attempting to log in.
      passwordEntered - The password entered by the employee.
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, otherwise false.

    • getEmployeeID

      public int getEmployeeID(String employeeName)
      Retrieves the employee ID from the database based on the given employee name.
      Parameters:
      employeeName - The name of the employee.
      Returns:
      The employee ID if found, otherwise returns 0.

    • loadItemsOnScreen

      public ArrayList<menuItemButton> loadItemsOnScreen()
      Loads the menu items from the database and creates a button for each item.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of menuItemButtons containing the menu items.
